name: ✧ ~〈 Monster High ☆Clawdeen Wolf☆ Amazon 〉~ ✧
description:
★゜・。。・゜゜・。。・゜☆゜・。。・゜゜・。。・゜★

Hey ❣ I spend quite a lot of time [maybe too much] on Amazon, so of course i wanted to make a theme ! And which character suits this website best ? Clawdeen, of course ;3 I hope you'll like it ♥

☆彡.。.:*・☆彡.。.:*・☆彡.。.:*・☆彡.。.:*・☆彡.。.:*・☆

♡ Website: Telegram ♡
♡ Theme: Pastel ♡
♡ Colors: Blue ~ Purple ~ Pink ~ White ♡

☆～☆～☆～☆～☆～☆～☆～☆～☆～☆～☆～☆～☆～☆～☆

additional_info: I made this theme according to the French and American Amazon, so some parts may look off on other versions of the site.
